kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Text
kw.doc: Click text identified by ``text``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageButton[@content-desc="Open navigation drawer"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageButton[@content-desc="Open navigation drawer"]

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Text
kw.doc: Click text identified by ``text``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` exactly contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

test.name: Deve acessar a tela de Formulários
